originalText.text: Overall, we are very happy with the building and staff. The assistant manager, Emir is outstanding. The amenities, the outdoor space, and the Views are fantastic. I’ve been leaving in building over two years, I’m very satisfied .

text.text: Overall, we are very happy with the building and staff. The assistant manager, Emir is outstanding. The amenities, the outdoor space, and the Views are fantastic. I’ve been leaving in building over two years, I’m very satisfied .

originalText.text: I’ve been living here for 2 yrs now. My daughter and I love it, and I know my son who was just born will love this building and neighborhood as well. The management office is downstairs right next to the gym. Emir (The AGM), is very friendly and very helpful, he's my go to guy whenever I need paper work or have concerns about anything. I’m really happy I made the decision to move be here.

originalText.text: I have been living in this building for a while now, and I must say that it has been a wonderful experience. The staff is very friendly and always willing to help. They are quick to respond to any issues that arise and make sure that everything is taken care of promptly. The building is well-maintained and always clean. The location is great, with easy access to public transportation and many restaurants and shops nearby. Overall, I would highly recommend this building to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient place to live.

originalText.text:
My experience residing in this building presently has been nothing short of exceptional. The management, led by Emir, continues to impress with their unwavering support and proactive approach. Emir consistently exceeds expectations in promptly and efficiently meeting residents' needs. His dedication to delivering top-tier service is truly commendable. Emir's friendly and professional demeanor shines through as he consistently assists and addresses any concerns.

The building remains impeccably maintained, providing a consistently comfortable and inviting atmosphere. The amenities continue to impress, enhancing the overall quality of our living experience. The management's meticulous attention to detail in maintaining the premises reflects their ongoing commitment to fostering a welcoming environment for all residents.

For anyone in search of a superior living space coupled with exceptional management, I wholeheartedly recommend this building. Emir's continuous readiness to assist and his remarkable helpfulness undoubtedly elevate the living experience here.

originalText.text: Great experience. No complaints. The neighborhood is quiet. I'm satisfied with the amenities such as taking the elevator downstairs to the lower level and using the laundry room anytime. The managers office is down the hall from the laundry room. The rent is reasonable compared to outside of Roosevelt Island. I'm satisfied that I can stay as long as I like.
